mapper.select: select subcategory_id, category_name from subcategory where maincategory_id = #{maincategoryNo}
select maincategory_id, category_name from maincategory where maincategory_id != -999

SELECT s.subcategory_id, s.category_name, s.maincategory_id, m.category_name AS maincategory_name, COALESCE(COUNT(c.subcategory_id), 0) AS count FROM subcategory s LEFT JOIN maincategory m ON s.maincategory_id = m.maincategory_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id WHERE s.subcategory_id = #{no}
select subcategory_id, maincategory_id, category_name from subcategory where category_name = #{name}

SELECT m.maincategory_id, m.category_name AS maincategory_name, s.subcategory_id, s.category_name, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN c.subcategory_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS count FROM maincategory m LEFT JOIN subcategory s ON m.maincategory_id = s.maincategory_id LEFT OUTER JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id WHERE m.maincategory_id = #{no} GROUP BY m.maincategory_id, m.category_name, s.subcategory_id, s.category_name ORDER BY s.subcategory_id
